vote.title: Authorize the City Manager to execute Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to add funding in the amount of $164,293.00 with Bridge Steps for the management and all operational responsibility of the City’s homeless shelter facility for FY 2023-24 for the Office of Homeless Solutions - Not to exceed $164,293.00, from $5,669,686.00 to $5,833,979.00 - Financing: FY 2022 TDHCA-Homeless Housing and Services Program Reallocation Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize the City Manager to execute Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to add funding in the amount of $164,293.00 with Bridge Steps for the management and all operational responsibility of the City’s homeless shelter facility for FY 2023-24 for the Office of Homeless Solutions - Not to exceed $164,293.00, from $5,669,686.00 to $5,833,979.00 - Financing: FY 2022 TDHCA-Homeless Housing and Services Program Reallocation Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
